title: Android 12L arrives on the Raspberry Pi 4, courtesy of a third-party ROM
content:
Earlier this month, Google released the stable version of Android 12L. For most Pixel owners, youâ€™ll need to download the latest build through OTA and enjoy the new release. Since this is XDA, a few creative modders have gotten the new Android version running on more unconventional devices, like the Nexus 7 2013, as well.

The post Android 12L arrives on the Raspberry Pi 4, courtesy of a third-party ROM appeared first on xda-developers.
description: An unofficial build of LineageOS 19.1 brings Android 12L to the Raspberry Pi 4 Model B and the Raspberry Pi 400. Read on to know more!
